HomePage.description: This is the homepage for Dyson India. The primary purpose is to showcase Dyson products and provide navigation to different product categories and information.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the Hushjet Purifier Compact product page.

elements.name: Vacuum & Wet Cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners product category page.

elements.name: Air Purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the air purifier product category page.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones product category page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the lighting product category page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best Sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

elements.name: Discover Dyson Link
elements.description: Link to the Discover Dyson page.

elements.name: For Business Link
elements.description: Link to the For Business page.

elements.name: Store Finder Link
elements.description: Link to the Store Finder page.

elements.name: Register Machine Link
elements.description: Link to the Register Machine page.

elements.name: Contact Us Link
elements.description: Link to the Contact Us page.

assertions: Title of the page is 'Dyson India | Official Website'
The main hero section text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is visible.

DysonIndiaOfficialWebsitePage.description: This page is a landing page for the Dyson Hushjet Purifier Compact. The primary purpose is to showcase the product and encourage users to purchase it.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field in the header.

elements.name: Shop now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page.

elements.name: Deals
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners page.

elements.name: Hair care
elements.description: Link to the hair care page.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier page.

elements.name: Headphones
elements.description: Link to the headphones page.

elements.name: Lighting
elements.description: Link to the lighting page.

elements.name: Support
elements.description: Link to the support page.

elements.name: Best sellers
elements.description: Link to the best sellers page.

assertions: Header text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is visible

ProductsPage.description: This page indicates an 'Access Denied' error when trying to add a product to the cart. The user does not have permission to access the specified URL.

elements.name: Access Denied Header
elements.description: The main header indicating access is denied.

elements.name: Error Description
elements.primary_locator: text="You don't have permission to access"
elements.backup_locator: text="You don't have permission to access"
elements.description: The description explaining the reason for the error.

elements.name: Error URL
elements.description: The URL that the user is trying to access.

elements.name: Reference Number
elements.description: The reference number for the error.

elements.name: Edgesuite URL
elements.description: The URL for the edgesuite error page.

assertions: Verify that the 'Access Denied' header is displayed
Verify that the error description is displayed
Verify that the error URL is displayed
Verify that the reference number is displayed
Verify that the edgesuite URL is displayed
